hero.name: Sthéfano Garcia Pícoli
hero.subtitle: I develop things for the web.
hero.first_paragraph: I'm a software developer with experience building web apps focused on scalability and user experience.

about_me.first_paragraph: Hi! My name is Sthéfano and I'm a web developer. Graduated in 2022 in Systems Analysis and Development by UniSales, I was awarded 'Featured Project' amongst all university courses on 3 out of the 5 semesters of my graduation. During my academic journey, I developed projects using C, Python, Java, JavaScript and the Vue.js framework.
about_me.second_paragraph: I also had the opportunity to work in a growing fintech from Vitória, Brazil, where I learned and improved clean code and good programming practices.
about_me.third_paragraph: Here are some of the technologies I have been working on professionally lately:

details.0: Responsible for developing the company website aswell as their customers' and ecommerce portal, used by over 70.000 customers and transactioning over R$5 billion annually
details.1: Got exposed to Angular during my tenure and used it as the main framework for most of the projects within Paytime
details.2: Advocated and helped establishing best practices within the engineering team, which brought benefits to the stability of the product and code hygiene. Engineers felt better working on projects
details.3: Being proactive and bringing many technical contributions that improved the overall experience at Paytime, I quickly got hired as a fulltime employee after only 3 months of internship, which felt nice
details.5: Worked closely with other teams to deliver the best possible user experience
